about_the_game:
Coolest Catto DLC

With the Coolest Catto DLC, you get access to extra maps, along with any new maps to be added in the future. The best part? Only one friend has to buy it! If the host owns the Coolest Catto DLC, everyone in the lobby can also access the new maps.

Feature list:

• 7 new maps on release, with more to come!'

• All community-made maps
• Any future content updates and game modes

Note from the developer:

Choosing to purchase the Coolest Catto DLC greatly helps me continue to work on the game and reinvest my free time into its development. Your support is appreciated!

Feature list:

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-Bit
  • Processor: ntel Core Duo Processor (2GHz or better)
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon HD 4350
  • Additional Notes: All OS's aside from Windows have been undertested. Feel free to report any issues you find to oakleybladegames.help@gmail.com so I can do my best to fix them.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core Duo Processor (2GHz or better)
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon HD 4350
  • Additional Notes: All OS's aside from Windows have been undertested. Feel free to report any issues you find to oakleybladegames.help@gmail.com so I can do my best to fix them.

name: Catto Pew Pew! - Coolest Catto DLC

package_groups.name: default

subs.option_text: Catto Pew Pew! - Coolest Catto DLC - $2.50 USD

package_groups.title: Buy Catto Pew Pew! - Coolest Catto DLC

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core Duo Processor (2GHz or better)
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon HD 4350
  • Additional Notes: This game should run okay on lower end computers. Through testing, an average of 100 FPS was achieved with minimum graphics settings at 840x420 resolution with the above specs.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-Bit Windows, Linux or Mac
  • Processor: Intel® Core™2 Quad Processor Q8200
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon HD 4350
  • Additional Notes: This game should run okay on lower end computers. Through testing, an average of 100 FPS was achieved with minimum graphics settings at 840x420 resolution with the above specs.

short_description: In the Coolest Catto DLC, you and your friends gain access to both new and community-made maps, along with exclusive content updates in the future.
